name: Instinct Versus Desire
desc: +5% Mag and -5% Str growth for every tome in Tokiko's inventory. +5% Str and -5% Mag for every sword/lance/axe in unit's inventory.
components: 5 * len([x.nid for x in unit.items if item_system.weapon_type(unit, x) in ['Anima', 'Dark', 'Light']])
-5 * len([x.nid for x in unit.items if item_system.weapon_type(unit, x) in ['Anima', 'Dark', 'Light']])
